You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Each of us can ask 3 questions. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image contains a series of pixelated shapes in different colors. There are four distinct shapes, each in a different color: purple, green, pink, and orange. Each shape resembles a Tetris block configuration. The purple shape looks like a "T" block, the green shape is an "L" block, the pink shape is a "T" block but with an additional pixel that extends from the center, and the orange shape is a zigzag "Z" block. The background is white, and the shapes do not touch each other.
continue
